name: Integrate Combined Reload/Stop, IE Style!
description: This style is depreciated.  It was intended for versions of firefox before FF4+.
additional_info:
This style was originally posted here: http://www.sleepingcats.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=20&t=63

I wanted to distribute it in a more install friendly form so I re posted it here.  It combines the start and reload buttons to look like IE 7+

Make sure to position the stop button to the left of the reload button.

Make sure to position the stop button to the left of the reload button.
